Secure Over the Air Upgrades

All Over The Air upgrades must happen over secure transports. Firmware Over The Air Upgrades (FOTA) can be built with secureboot which enables the use of encrypted files.

For more information on using secureboot with FOTA, refer to the FOTA application.
